mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wms_bt_client_shipment ( shipment_id, order_channel_id, file_name, brand, transfer_id, syn_flg, active, created, creater, modified, modifier ) values ( null, #{order_channel_id}, #{file_name}, #{brand}, #{transfer_id}, #{syn_flg}, #{active}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )

INSERT INTO wms_bt_client_package ( package_id, shipment_id, ucc128_carton_no, ship_to_store, ship_date, total_carton_quantity, ship_via, tracking_no, shipping_material, cancellation_flag, active, created, creater, modified, modifier ) values ( null, #{shipment_id}, #{ucc128_carton_no}, #{ship_to_store}, #{ship_date}, #{total_carton_quantity}, #{ship_via}, #{tracking_no}, #{shipping_material}, #{cancellation_flag}, #{active}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )

INSERT INTO wms_bt_client_package_item ( package_item_id, shipment_id, package_id, carton_line_number, sto_no, sto_line_no, article_number, shipped_qty, calc_qty, fact_unit_nom, base_uom, stock_type, site, shipping_point, upc, active, created, creater, modified, modifier ) values ( null, #{shipment_id}, #{package_id}, #{carton_line_number}, #{sto_no}, #{sto_line_no}, #{article_number}, #{shipped_qty}, #{calc_qty}, #{fact_unit_nom}, #{base_uom}, #{stock_type}, #{site}, #{shipping_point}, #{upc}, #{active}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} )
